files.template:
name: CI Matrix
on: [push]
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix: { node: [18,20], pkg: ['pkg-a','pkg-b'] }
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with: { node-version: ${{ matrix.node }} }
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm -w ${{ matrix.pkg }} test
